name: Torterra
description: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.effect: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.  This ability functions identically to battle armor.
